creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: brown and tan cotton plaid with 18-1/2" embroidered ends; large geometric cross stitch pattern; one end in tan, purple and aqua, other in gold, purple and green; next 6-1/2" section on both ends adds yellow; eleven silk tassels with beads and wrapped silk ornaments in all colors plus pink
dimension:
133 x 18 3/4 in. (337.82 x 47.63 cm)
12 in. (30.48 cm) (object part, tassels)
title: Turban
